skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alexander the comic
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Bringing you some of the best episodes of Alexander the Comic, the stand-up comedian of south India. This skill opens the world of Alex's shows to your Alexa.

How to play the shows?

Alexa, open Alexander the comic
Alexa, ask Alexander the comic to play The Yogi and the Bear
Alexa, ask Alexander the comic for help
Alexa, ask Alexander the comic for list of shows

Other capabilities:
Alexa, pause – pause the current play.
Alexa, stop – stops the current play.
Alexa, resume – will resume the paused or stopped show.
Alexa, next – plays the next show.
Alexa, previous – plays the previous show.
Alexa, shuffle - play shows in random order.

https://www.facebook.com/ILikeSlander/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
